thread.title: Free UE Hoopfest at Ford Center
thread.title_full: Free UE Hoopfest at Ford Center

author: Erin Meyer
title: Free UE Hoopfest at Ford Center
text:
Free UE Hoopfest at Ford Center Posted: emeyer@14news.com EVANSVILLE, IN (WFIE) - 
University of Evansville men’s and women’s basketball fans will have their first chance to see the teams in action this season Thursday at Hoopfest. 
The free event begins at 7 p.m. at the Ford Center. Doors open at 6 p.m. 
Players from both teams will compete in a 3-Point Challenge. They’ll also scrimmage and sign autographs. 
The first 1,000 fans will receive a free Aces Hoopfest t-shirt. 
Soft drinks will be offered for $1 and hot dogs for $2. 
This will also be the first chance for fans to pick up season ticket boxes. They’ll be available in the main lobby. 
For more information about Hoopfest, UE basketball tickets and Aces athletics, visit GoPurpleAces.com or follow @UEAthletics on Twitter.
